channel.title: 317 [small list of things i need help on]
channel.description:
Hey everyone, thanks for viewing, i really need some help on the following topics, any help would be much appreciated.
-Prayer, when I try to bury any bone it says "nothing interesting happens" is their like a code or something I need in client.java? or do i need a specific handler for it? Like the player handler etc.
-Basically making an object work as a portal, like the gangplank in Port Sarim, I want people to be able to click this and get sent to Karamja, I still havent found a fix for this.
-Turning a player into an Easter rabbit, I know it's funny, but on one server I played on if you clicked "death" you would turn into a "grim reaper" and it was cool.
-Making more than one mining rock work, only a few in my server work, and i want them to have infinite stock as well.
-Same thing with trees, they fall, and I don't want them too, I want their to be an infinite stock as well.
-Making gates (etc.) open, I have been trying to find a way to make certain gate open, and they are not working, they don't open,
-Adding emoted to me server, when i click an emote button (yes, no jump for joy, etc.) nothing happens, any way to fix this?
And that's just all i can think of at the moment, again if you can help, I will rep you thanks so much for helping if you do :p

item.title: 317 [small list of things i need help on]
item.dc:creator: @icp_again icp again
item.description:
@icp_again wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:3, topic:268189”][quote author=icp again link=topic=353977.msg2712272#msg2712272 date=1237401346]
yeah you can, you need 15 posts before you can rep people, and i’ll check the tut section…
[/quote]

LOL you need 15 rep silly… not 15 posts… ive got 60~ post and i can’t rep[/quote]

uhh…no because i only have 10 rep and i can rep people…

Read full topic
